flavorText:
"Channeling the white-hot power of all five suns creates a pretty good diversion."
—Yavash of the Accorders

foreignData.flavorText: „Wenn man das grelle Licht aller fünf Sonnen zusammenfasst, ergibt das ein ziemlich gutes Ablenkungsmanöver." —Yavash von den Harmoniern
foreignData.name: Glänzende Ablenkung
foreignData.text: Bestimme zwei Kreaturen deiner Wahl. Tappe diese Kreaturen und löse dann alle Ausrüstungen von ihnen.

foreignData.flavorText: "Canalizar el poder ardiente de los cinco soles crea una distracción bastante efectiva." —Yavash de los acordantes
foreignData.name: Distracción fulgente
foreignData.text: Elige dos criaturas objetivo. Gira esas criaturas, luego desanexa todos los equipos anexados a ellas.

foreignData.flavorText: « Canaliser la puissance irradiante des cinq soleils permet de créer une excellente diversion. » —Yavash des Accordeurs
foreignData.name: Distraction éblouissante
foreignData.text: Choisissez deux créatures ciblées. Engagez ces créatures, puis détachez tous leurs équipements.

foreignData.flavorText: "Incanalare l'incandescente potere bianco di tutti e cinque i soli crea un bel diversivo." —Yavash dei Concordi
foreignData.name: Distrazione Splendente
foreignData.text: Scegli due creature bersaglio. TAPpa quelle creature, poi togli da esse tutti gli Equipaggiamenti.

foreignData.flavorText: 「五つすべての太陽の白熱の力を受け入れることは、きわめて素晴らしい陽動だ。」 ――調和者隊のヤヴァシュ
foreignData.name: 燦爛たる放心
foreignData.text: クリーチャー２体を対象とする。 それらをタップし、その後それらからすべての装備品をはずす。

foreignData.flavorText: "Canalizando o poder branco e quente de todos os cinco sóis é possível criar uma excelente diversão." — Yavash, dos Concordantes
foreignData.name: Distração Fulgente
foreignData.text: Escolha duas criaturas alvo. Vire essas criaturas e depois solte todos os Equipamentos anexados a elas.

foreignData.flavorText: «Если объединить в пучок раскаленную добела энергию всех пяти солнц, то можно неплохо отвлечь врага». — Яваш из войска Согласителей
foreignData.name: Сияющее Отвлечение
foreignData.text: Выберите два целевых существа. Поверните те существа, затем открепите от них все Снаряжение.

foreignData.flavorText: 「转化五阳的白热力量，能带来很好的消遣。」 ～轮驻军亚瓦许
foreignData.name: 眩光扰神
foreignData.text: 选择两个目标生物。 横置这些生物，然后将其上的所有武具卸装。

foreignData.flavorText: 「轉化五陽的白熱力量，能夠有效地轉移注意力。」 ～輪駐軍亞瓦許
foreignData.name: 眩光擾神
foreignData.text: 選擇兩個目標生物。 橫置這些生物，然後將其上的所有武具卸裝。

name: Fulgent Distraction
originalText: Choose two target creatures. Tap those creatures, then unattach all Equipment from them.

rulings.text: You must target two creatures as you cast Fulgent Distraction. If you can’t (because there’s just one creature on the battlefield, perhaps), you can’t cast the spell.
Fulgent Distraction can target tapped and/or unequipped creatures.

If one of the targeted creatures is an illegal target by the time Fulgent Distraction resolves, that creature won’t become tapped and no Equipment will be unattached from it. The other creature will still be affected. If both of the targeted creatures are illegal targets by the time Fulgent Distraction resolves, the spell doesn’t resolve.

text: Choose two target creatures. Tap those creatures, then unattach all Equipment from them.
